properties.areaDesc: Butler, KY; Muhlenberg, KY; Ohio, KY
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 11:57AM EST by NWS Louisville KY
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky...

Green River at Rochester

affecting the following counties in Kentucky...Butler...Muhlenberg...
Ohio.

.Heavy rain on Wednesday falling over already saturated grounds will
cause the river to rise.

The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Green River at Rochester.
* from Wednesday morning until further notice.
* At  6:00 AM Tuesday the stage was 15.1 feet.
* Flood stage is 17.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Wednesday late morning and
continue to rise to near 22.3 feet by early Sunday morning.
* Impact...At 24.0 feet...KY 1117 floods near Mining City.
* Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 22.2
feet on Mar 17 2015.
properties.instruction:
If you are affected by these crests take any necessary actions.
Additional information is available at
water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lmk.
